title: naLina lOchana
sahitya:
naLina lOcana ninnu gAka anyula nammi nara janma mIdErunA



anupallavi



 jalajApta kula bhUSaNa subhASaNa sajjana pOSaNa janakasutA ramaNa



caraNam 1



 kongavaNTi dhyAnamu jEsina tana kOrika gonasAgunA dOgamAgani bhakti mIra  

nammitE manci dOva jUpa nErcunA gangalOni yODanu nammi bhavasAgaramu 

dATavaccunA nanganAcula sharaNanandu cEta yanaguDu jnAnOpadEshamu jEsunA

   

caraNam 2



 parama vandhyaku pAlu pErugu bOsitE jaNTi pAlu nErcunA nera dhanamulu dayAdula-

kiccitE nenaru mATa galugunA evaru vEsi yusharabhUmi vittitE nEmaina phalincunA 

varamaina pEru kalugu gangAraviki vandana monarincatE brOva nErcunA

   

caraNam 3



 sogasaina bUrugulanu bEncitE surasa phalamu liccunA bhAgyamu gala tirumanjana  

vibhAvamu paricara kula kabbunA rAga lObhamulatO tapamu jESitE paragat galuga 

nErcunA tyAgarAja sannuta sadguNa satya svarUpa nirvikAra parAtpara
